mapper.select: SELECT QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS "qestnrTmplatId", QUSTNR_TMPLAT_TY AS "qestnrTmplatTy", FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm", FRST_REGISTER_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, QUSTNR_TMPLAT_DC AS "qestnrTmplatCn", QUSTNR_TMPLAT_PATH_NM AS "qestnrTmplatCours" FROM LETTNQUSTNRTMPLAT WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId}

SELECT A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS "qestnrTmplatId", A.QESTNR_ID, A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID AS "qestnrQesitmId", A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.ETC_ANSWER_CN, A.RESPOND_ANSWER_CN, A.RESPOND_NM FROM LETTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT A WHERE 1=1 AND A.QESTNR_ID = #{qestnrId} AND A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID = #{qestnrTmplatId} AND A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID IS NULL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT QUSTNR_RSPNS_RESULT_ID AS "qestnrQesrspnsId", ( SELECT QESTN_TY_CODE FROM LETTNQUSTNRQESITM WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID ) QESTN_TY_CODE, ( SELECT QESTN_CN FROM LETTNQUSTNRQESITM WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_QESITM_ID = A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID ) QESTN_CN, ( SELECT IEM_CN FROM LETTNQUSTNRIEM WHERE 1=1 AND QUSTNR_IEM_ID = A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID ) IEM_CN, A.QUSTNR_IEM_ID, A.QUSTNR_QESITM_ID, A.QESTNR_ID, A.RESPOND_ANSWER_CN, A.RESPOND_NM, A.ETC_ANSWER_CN, A.QUSTNR_TMPLAT_ID AS "qestnrTmplatId", A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS "frstRegisterPnttm", A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, (SELECT USER_NM FROM COMVNUSERMASTER WHERE ESNTL_ID = A.FRST_REGISTER_ID) FRST_REGISTER_NM, A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM LETTNQUSTNRRSPNSRESULT A WHERE 1=1

AND RESPOND_NM LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstIndex} + 1 AND #{firstIndex} + #{recordCountPerPage}
